extracted_playbook.title: Identify Installed Plugin Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check the installed version of the '_OMGF | GDPR/DSGVO Compliant, Faster Google Fonts. Easy._' plugin to determine if it is 5.7.9 or below.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the plugin version 5.7.9 or below?

extracted_playbook.title: Update Plugin
extracted_playbook.description: Update the '_OMGF | GDPR/DSGVO Compliant, Faster Google Fonts. Easy._' plugin to version 5.7.10 or later to apply the necessary security fixes.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor for Unauthorized Changes
extracted_playbook.description: Monitor the WordPress site for any signs of unauthorized changes, such as injected scripts or deleted directories.

cve_id: _OMGF | GDPR/DSGVO Compliant, Faster Google Fonts. Easy._ plugin vulnerability
affected_products: _OMGF | GDPR/DSGVO Compliant, Faster Google Fonts. Easy._ plugin version 5.7.9 and below
